Html.name: Html0
Html.content: In order to maintain just one container page which will be used for all language specific sub sites one can create a container page in just one of the folders for the locales, e.g. in the folder de and create as many siblings out of the container page resource as locales are supported. All these siblings of the source container page will reflect the changes of the source page and can be moved to the respective locale folder. It follows a quick description how to create siblings of resources in the VFS. In the following the container page for the de locale is used as source for the sibling in the es folder.
